attributes.action: Make random drug and alcohol testing mandatory for all MPs and their staff
attributes.background: Protect our National Security. Decisions of national importance are made in the Houses of Parliament and the House of Lords. The people working there should not be under the influence of alcohol and/or drugs when making decisions that affect us.

rejection.details:
The UK Government or Parliament are not responsible for conducting drug and alcohol testing.

You may like to sign this petition:
Prohibit MPs from voting in parliament when under the influence of alcohol
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300021
